hours_text:
# HOURS OF OPERATION

MUSEUM HOURS

Tuesday, Wednesday, Friday: 10 a.m. - 4 p.m.  
Thursday: 4 p.m. - 8 p.m.  
Saturday: 10 a.m. - 2 p.m.   
Sunday & Monday: closed

ADMISSION

Admission is free to visit our 1st floor temporary exhibit hall, giftshop, & genealogy library. 

Admission to our 2nd floor permanent exhibit is $8 per adult. Members and children under the age of 13 are admitted for free. Effective as of 2/1/25

FIND US

400 S. Main Street  
Broken Arrow, Oklahoma 74012

CONNECT

(918) 258-2616

  * [](https://twitter.com/BAMuseum)

admission_text:
# GET INVOLVED

## BECOME A MEMBER

Take advantage of exclusive events, discounts and classes. There are so many ways you can be part of the family here at The Museum Broken Arrow. A great way is by becoming a valued member. All the proceeds of the application and membership fees go directly towards maintaining our museum and improving our services and offerings. We wouldn’t be able to offer all the amazing exhibits and events if it weren’t for the support of our members. Memberships support museum exhibits, collections care, events, programs and publications. As member, you have the opportunity to share a common bond with others who support and appreciate Broken Arrow, its unique history and the arts.

Membership is easy! Just click on the button below to choose your membership level and become involved as a supporter of The Museum Broken Arrow!

[CLICK HERE TO BECOME A MEMBER ](https://www.brokenarrowmuseum.org/membership-form)

All membership levels enjoy:

  * Free Admission

  * Monthly Digital Newsletter

  * Discounted Special Events Tickets

  * 10% off Gift Shop purchases

[](https://narmassociation.org/)

Membership Levels 

​

First Timer - $25

  * Individual benefits for one person

  * Valid for anyone who has never had a BAHS Membership

  * (Valid for one calendar year)

​

Community Helper - $25

  * Individual benefits for one person

  * (Memberships are valid for any teacher and first responders with a valid ID)

​

Historian - $50

  * Individual benefits...
collections_text:
# UNIQUELY BA!

The Museum Broken Arrow's mission is to be a place where our community comes together to explore Broken Arrow's past, appreciate its present, and imagine its future. 

[LEARN MORE ABOUT US! ](https://www.brokenarrowmuseum.org/about-the-museum)

MUSEUM HOURS

Tuesday, Wednesday, Friday: 10 a.m. - 4 p.m.  
Thursday: 4 p.m. - 8 p.m.  
Saturday: 10 a.m. - 2 p.m.   
Sunday & Monday: closed

ADMISSION

Admission is free to visit the 1st-floor temporary exhibit hall, gift shop, & the genealogy library. Admission to our 2nd floor permanent exhibit is $8 per adult. Members, NARM, & children under the age of 13 are admitted for free. 

FIND US

400 S. Main Street  
Broken Arrow, Oklahoma 74012

CONNECT

(918) 258-2616

  * [](https://www.facebook.com/themuseumba)
  * [](https://twitter.com/BAMuseum)
  * [](https://www.pinterest.com/TheMuseumBA/)
  * [](https://www.instagram.com/TheMuseumBA/)

Exhibits & Event Calendar

## RENT OUR SPACE

From community events to family celebrations, we can host your next special event right here at the museum.

[LEARN MORE](https://www.brokenarrowmuseum.org/facility-rental)

## IN OUR GIFT SHOP

[SHOP NOW](https://store40540226.shopsettings.com/)

You can purchase Museum BA memberships, special event tickets, and donate through our online shop.
